comments.text:
How To Install World of Warcraft WoW On Steam Deck: SteamOS Gaming Mode Setup Guide (BattleNet CurseForge ConsolePort)

In this video we'll be installing and setting up World of Warcraft on the Steam Deck via BattleNet on our Micro SD or Internal Drive with full controller support through ConsolePort and getting started with basic functionality and configuration.

❤ Subscribe: Official Channel - https://www.youtube.com/@DeckWizard
❤ Turn on the 🔔 to get notified for all new Steam Deck/Handheld performance videos!

📀 Download Battle Net - https://us.shop.battle.net/
📀 Download CurseForge - https://www.curseforge.com/
🛠 Install Cover Art Guide - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=USnS9K0fpQM

🎮 Steam Deck OLED
🎮 World of Warcraft
⚙ SteamOS 3.7.19
🛠 Installed on Internal Drive (Fresh Clean Install)

⏱ Timestamps ⏱
00:00 - Intro
00:25 - Make Folder
00:45 - Download CurseForge & BattleNet
01:04 - Install BattleNet
02:10 - Setup BattleNet Launcher
02:53 - BattleNet Gaming Mode Login
03:17 - Download World of Warcraft
04:07 - Install CurseForge
04:49 - Install ConsolePort
05:05 - Manually Add Mods (Optional)
05:44 - First Time WoW Launch
05:59 - ConsolePort Tour
07:39 - Add Cover Art In Gaming Mode
08:20 - Outro/Thanks For Watching

❤ Subscribe - https://www.youtube.com/@DeckWizard

Steam Deck OLED
SteamOS 3.7.19
4GB VRAM
